name: Can Connect
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the monitored MySQL instance. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Replication Running (Deprecated)
description: Deprecated. Returns CRITICAL for a replica that's not running Slave_IO_Running or Slave_SQL_Running, WARNING if one of the two is not running. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Replication Running
description: Returns CRITICAL for a replica that's not running Replica_IO_Running or Replica_SQL_Running, WARNING if one of the two is not running. Returns `OK` otherwise.

name: Group Replication host status
description: Returns `OK` if the host status is ONLINE, returns `CRITICAL` otherwise.
